author: cbs8
title: TheBeautyPlace.com Hair Styler Contest
text:
Win this travel-friendly heat styling tool. Contest ends October 18, 2015 11:59 PM EST.
(PRWEB) October 13, 2015
With Fall weather approaching and holiday travel season upon us, TheBeautyPlace.com is giving away a travel-friendly heat styling tool for this monthâ€™s Facebook Hair Styler Contest.
Enter to win!
How to Enter:
1. Like TheBeautyPlace.com on Facebook
2. Comment on Contest Image Answering: What Is Your Favorite Hair Style?
3. Follow us on Instagram @thebeautyplace
4. Share Facebook Contest Image With Friends
Contestants must enter by October 18, 2015 11:59 PM Eastern Standard Time.
The winner will be announced after 12 PM Eastern Standard Time on October 20, 2015.
The Prize:
1 TIGI Pro Mini Flat Iron
Rules:
Winner is responsible for contacting TheBeautyPlace.com with the shipping address to obtain the prize. Must redeem by October 24, 2015 3 PM Eastern Standard Time. No purchase is necessary to win. Valid for U.S. entries only.
About TheBeautyPlace.com:
TheBeautyPlace.com is a leading online company of top brands at affordable prices. From skin care, hair care and everything beauty, TheBeautyPlace.com strives to offer current and prospective clients excellent customer service and make available the most coveted beauty products in the industry.
Follow TheBeautyPlace.com:
On Pinterest: pinterest.com/thebeautyplace/
On Twitter: @TheBeautyPlace
On Instagram: @TheBeautyPlace
On Facebook: facebook.com/pages/TheBeautyPlacecom/125435188536
TheBeautyPlace.com Blog: blog.thebeautyplace.com
Good Luck!
